titleStmt.title: The faythfull and true storye of the destruction of Troye, compyled by Dares Phrigius, which was a souldier while the siege lasted, translated into Englyshe by Thomas Paynell
De excidio Troiae historia. English
titleStmt.author: Dares, Phrygius.

titleStmt.title: The faythfull and true storye of the destruction of Troye, compyled by Dares Phrigius, which was a souldier while the siege lasted, translated into Englyshe by Thomas Paynell
De excidio Troiae historia. English
titleStmt.author: Dares, Phrygius.
Paynell, Thomas.
Heret, Mathurin, 1518-1585.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules churcheyard, at the signe of the holy ghost, by Iohn Cawood prynter to the Queenes hyghnes],

notesStmt.note: An English translation, by Thomas Paynell, of Mathurin Heret's French translation of: Dares, Phrygius. De excidio Troiae historia.
Running title reads: The hystory of the ruyne of Troy.
Caption title (leaf H4) reads: Menelaus oration vnto the Troyanes for the repetion of Helen. Register is continuous.
Identified as STC 5581 on UMI microfilm reel 204.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
